Comment.value:
Class Customizations:

Master Harper has been completely revamped.  There is no longer a 5 level cap.  However, this class will only be available to those with the custom hak.
Master Harpers add half their HS levels to their caster level for all spells regardless of caster class.

Prerequisites:
Alignment: any non-evil
Feats: Alertness, Iron Will, Weapon Finesse
Skills: Discipline: 8, Lore: 10, Persuade: 8, Search: 5
Proficiencies: simple weapons, light armor 
Base Attack Bonus: + 3/4 levels 
Primary Saving Throws: reflex, will 
Hit Die: d6 
Skill Points: 6 + int modifier
Class Skills: 
concentration, parry,appraise, bluff, craft armor, craft trap, craft weapon, disable trap, heal, hide, intimidate, listen, lore, move silently, open lock, pick pocket, search, set trap, spot, tumble, use magic device.
Epic Bonus Feats: 
Armor Skin, Blinding speed, Epic Blinding Speed, Epic Prowess, Epic Skill Focus, Epic Weapon Focus, Epic Will, Great Charisma, Great Dexterity, Legendary Blinding Speed, Self Concealment.

Level 1: Milil's Ear

Level 3: Sneak Attack 1d6

Level 5: Mielikki's Truth

Level 9: Lliira's Heart

Level 10: Craft Harper Item

Level 14: Bonus Feat

Level 15: Deneir's Eye, one use per day, Sneak attack 2d6

Level 17: Bonus Feat

Level 20: Tymora's Smile, Sneak attack 3d6, Mielikki's Truth 2 per day, Bonus Feat

Level 23: Bonus Feat

Level 26: Bonus Feat, Harper Secret #1, Sneak Attack 4d6

Level 29: Harper Secret #2, Bonus Feat

Level 30: Deneir's Eye: Twice per Day, damage bonus increased to 2d6, Sneak attack 5d6

Level 35: Master Harper able to use stealth twice per day which casts a Sanctuary effect on themselves. DC: 10 + Move Silently Skill / 2 (Max 70). Duration: Move Silently Skill / 3 in Seconds (Max: 40 Seconds). If the Harper does not have Hide in Plain Sight, they will be unable to use this ability when in the visibility of enemies. SOMETHING about being flagged and requiring a certain % of spawns in an area to be cleared.

Level 40: Milil's Ear, Lliira's Heart save bonus increases to +6.

Level 45: Deneir's Eye: Thrice per day.  Damage bonus increased to 3d6.  Mielikki's Truth 3 per day

Feat Customizations:
Craft Harper Item: 
At 20 HS levels you can make Divine Power potions.  At 30, Shadow Shield.  Tho, they can be transferred to other characters, they are usable only by characters with the required Master Harper levels!
Deneir's Eye: 
1d6 + 1 per 2 HS levels of Sonic damage, target must make a Will Save against a DC of 5 + Chr Modifier + HS Level or become confused for 2 rounds.
Lliira's Heart: 
Grants +4 to universal saves and immunity to Time Stop
Mielikki's Truth: 
Once per day, Lesser spell breach
Milil's Ear: 
+4 bonus to listen, spot, search
Tymora's Smile: 
The caster gains a +1 bonus to attack and weapon damage rolls for every five Master Harper levels over twenty (minimum +1, to a maximum of +5). The damage granted is magical and unresistable.  The duration is 1 turn (60 seconds).
Doom
Harper Secret #1: 
The master Harper can choose any feat from: skill mastery, slippery mind, evasion.  Harper Secrets are ONLY usable on the level that they are received.  They may be used once only.
Harper Secret #2 
The master Harper can choose any feat from: As above + Bane of enemies, Epic dodge. Harper Secrets are ONLY usable on the level that they are received.  They may be used once only.

value.0:
Class Customizations:

Master Harper has been completely revamped. There is no longer a 5 level cap.  However, this class will only be available to those with the custom hak.
Master Harpers add half their HS levels to their caster level for all spells regardless of caster class.

Prerequisites:
Alignment: any non-evil
Feats: Alertness, Iron Will, Weapon Finesse
Skills: Discipline: 8, Lore: 10, Persuade: 8, Search: 5
Proficiencies: simple weapons, light armor 
Base Attack Bonus: + 3/4 levels 
Primary Saving Throws: reflex, will 
Hit Die: d6 
Skill Points: 6 + int modifier
Class Skills: 
concentration, parry,appraise, bluff, craft armor, craft trap, craft weapon, disable trap, heal, hide, intimidate, listen, lore, move silently, open lock, pick pocket, search, set trap, spot, tumble, use magic device.
Epic Bonus Feats: 
Armor Skin, Blinding speed, Epic Blinding Speed, Epic Prowess, Epic Skill Focus, Epic Weapon Focus, Epic Will, Great Charisma, Great Dexterity, Legendary Blinding Speed, Self Concealment.

Level 1: Milil's Ear

Level 3: Sneak Attack 1d6

Level 5: Mielikki's Truth

Level 9: Lliira's Heart

Level 10: Craft Harper Item

Level 14: Bonus Feat

Level 15: Deneir's Eye, one use per day, Sneak attack 2d6

Level 17: Bonus Feat

Level 20: Tymora's Smile, Sneak attack 3d6, Mielikki's Truth 2 per day, Bonus Feat

Level 23: Bonus Feat

Level 26: Bonus Feat, Harper Secret #1, Sneak Attack 4d6

Level 29: Harper Secret #2, Bonus Feat

Level 30: Deneir's Eye: Twice per Day, damage bonus increased to 2d6, Sneak attack 5d6

Level 35: Master Harper able to use stealth twice per day which casts a Sanctuary effect on themselves. DC: 10 + Move Silently Skill / 2 (Max 70). Duration: Move Silently Skill / 3 in Seconds (Max: 40 Seconds). If the Harper does not have Hide in Plain Sight, they will be unable to use this ability when in the visibility of enemies. SOMETHING about being flagged and requiring a certain % of spawns in an area to be cleared.

Level 40: Milil's Ear, Lliira's Heart save bonus increases to +6.

Level 45: Deneir's Eye: Thrice per day. Damage bonus increased to 3d6. Mielikki's Truth 3 per day

Feat Customizations:
Craft Harper Item:
At 20 HS levels you can make Divine Power potions. At 30, Shadow Shield. Tho, they can be transferred to other characters, they are usable onlyby characters with the required Master Harper levels!
Deneir's Eye: 
1d6 + 1 per 2 HS levels of Sonic damage, target must make a Will Save against a DC of 5 + Chr Modifier + HS Level or become confused for 2 rounds.
Lliira's Heart:
Grants +4 to universal saves and immunity to Time Stop
Mielikki's Truth:
Once per day, Lesser spell breach
Milil's Ear:
+4 bonus to listen, spot, search
Tymora's Smile: 
The caster gains a +1 bonus to attack and weapon damage rolls for every five Master Harper levels over twenty (minimum +1, to a maximum of +5). The damage granted is magical and unresistable. The duration is 1 turn (60 seconds).
Doom
Harper Secret #1: 
The master Harper can choose any feat from: skill mastery, slippery mind, evasion. Harper Secrets are ONLY usable on the level that they are received. They may be used once only.
Harper Secret #2
The master Harper can choose any feat from: As above + Bane of enemies, Epic dodge. Harper Secrets are ONLY usable on the level that they are received. They may be used once only.
